subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia, the Boston Red Sox’ second baseman, was an easy pick for American League rookie of the year, while Ryan Braun barely edged Troy Tulowitzki for the National League honor yesterday.
snippet: Dustin Pedroia, the Boston Red Sox’ second baseman, was an easy pick for American League rookie of the year, while Ryan Braun barely edged Troy Tulowitzki for the National League honor yesterday.
